original_text: And the Nazirite shall shave his consecrated head at the entrance of the tent of meeting and shall take the hair from his consecrated head and put it on the fire that is under the sacrifice of the peace offering.
korean_text: 자기의 몸을 구별한 나실인은 회막 문에서 자기의 머리털을 밀고 그것을 화목제물 밑에 있는 불에 둘지며

sentences.original_text: And the Nazirite shall shave his consecrated head
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나실인은 자신의 구별된 머리를 깎아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: at the entrance of the tent of meeting
and shall take the hair from his consecrated head
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자신의 구별된 머리에서 그 머리카락을 취해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and put it on the fire
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것을 불 위에 올려놓아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: that is under the sacrifice of the peace offering
